featherbed

Asynchronous Scala HTTP client using Finagle, Shapeless and Cats

View on GitHub

Tutorial Index

These tutorials will walk you through uses of featherbed. Because these tutorials are actually evaluated by tut as part of the build process, they also function as unit tests!

  1. Basic Usage
  2. Content Types and Encoders
  3. Response Decoding and Validation
  4. Building REST Clients
